She knew that nothing could stop her, much less having two children, so she decided to work 10 hours a day. Over time she was able to prepare herself and devote her time to selling stuffed potatoes, "patasca" (tripe soup), "chanfainita" (oxtail stew), and other entree dishes. She believes she has done very well in her business because she always provides her customers with very good service.

With the help of Kiva lenders, Margarita will be able to buy a few necessary supplies for preparing her dishes for the summer season. With great effort and dedication, she has accomplished her goals, such as attracting customers who live in the surrounding areas. Later on, she wants to fulfill her latest dream of opening a small shop in the central part of the city of Ica.

loans.use: to buy supplies for preparing summer food.

loans.name: Santos Porfirio

texts.es:
El señor Santos se dedica a la Compra y Venta de productos plásticos y metal para reciclaje, cuenta con una experiencia de 08 años, comienza muy temprano a visitar varias comunidades para la compra del material que luego el vende en una bodega, también se dedica a la venta de camarones, sandia y otros productos, le gusta mucho lo que hace ya que pasa ocupado todo el día y los ingresos que recibe de sus negocios son muy buenos con los que ha  logrado salir adelante con su compañera de hogar y un hijo.

Esta solicitando crédito por la cantidad de L. 20,000.00 mismo que será utilizado para la compra de material reciclable ya que necesita contar con suficiente dinero todos los días. Espera que Prisma pueda apoyarle.
texts.en:
Mr. Santos works selling and buying plastic and metal materials to recycle. He has 8 years of experience; he begins his day very early by visiting various neighborhoods to buy material that is later sold to a warehouse. Mr. Santos also sells shrimp, watermelons and other products. He enjoys his work since he spends his days being very busy. Mr. Santos' income from his businesses are good and have been enough for him to get ahead in life with his partner and son.

Mr. Santos needs a loan of L. 20,000.00, money that will be used to buy recyclable materials since he needs to have enough money everyday. He hopes that Prisma will be able to help him.

loans.use: buy recyclable materials (plastic and metal) for his business.

loans.name: Maria Ignacia

texts.es:
Maria tiene 33 años de edad, es casada y tiene 3 hijos los cuales están en edad escolar, tiene casa propia en la cual vive junto a su familia y esta ubicada en un caserío pequeño de “Vallecito” en el Distrito de Tambogrande, perteneciente a la provincia de Piura. Es un caserío en vías de desarrollo el cual por ahora solo cuenta con el servicio de energía eléctrica.

Su actividad económica a la que se dedica a la agricultura, para lo que cuenta con sembrios de  limón el cual cosecha semanalmente y los ofrece en los mercados de los caseríos cercanos al suyo, adicionalmente con el apoya de su esposa también crían, engordan y comercializan ganado como ovinos, caprinos, y aves de corral en su mayoría,  ambos se apoyan en todas las actividades diarias en cuento a sus negocios, pues la relación que existe en su familia es muy buena por lo que tienen sus objetivos están bien planteados por lo que desean tener mejor calidad de vida y sobre todo buscar nuevas y mejores oportunidades educativas para sus hijos.

Ahora esta solicitando un crédito en Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 3000 Nuevos Soles los cuales invertirá en la compra de fertilizantes para su limón y la compra alimentos balanceados para su ganado, el cual le permitirá ponerlos en mejor peso y tamaña para solicitar mayores precios.
texts.en:
Maria is 33 years old, is married and has 3 children who are of school age. She has her own home where she lives with her family in a small neighborhood called “Vallecito” in the district of Tambogrande, part of Piura province. It is a neighborhood in development which up to this point only has electricity.

Maria works in agriculture and has lemon crops which are harvested weekly and sold in neighboring markets. With her husband’s help they also breed, fatten and sell sheep, goats, and poultry. They support each other in their work since the relationship that exists in their family is very good which is why they have well thought out goals and wish to have a better quality of life and above all have new and better educational opportunities for their children.

Maria needs a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for 3000 Nuevos Soles which will be used to buy fertilizers for her lemon trees and balanced food for her animals which will allow them to have better weight and size which will help her get better prices.

loans.use: buy fertilizers and balanced food.

loans.name: José Mariano

texts.es:
José es un hombre adulto de 55 años que a pesar de que tiene hijos vive solo en "Los Bancos" que es un cantón rural que pertenece a la provincia de Pichincha (donde se encuentra la capital del Ecuador), toda la zona es visitada por sus cascadas, ríos y biodiversidad. La comida típica es la guaña o campeche, que es un pescado que se consume estofado con plátano de tipo denominado orito verde. El ceviche de palmito, la tilapia, lomo a la piedra y el dulce de guayaba.

José es un hombre que trabaja realizando trabajos de albañilería y carpintería, oficio que aprendió desde que era joven. Su sueño es poder terminar su casa y para empezar con ello se valdrá de un crédito el cual le permita realizar algunos arreglos. Este hombre trabaja muy duro durante 8 horas al día de lunes a sábado y a pesar de que es un cliente nuevo, la evaluación realizada por Fundación Alternativa lo considera un cliente que podrá pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.

Este hombre es aficionado al canto y a tocar la guitarra. Sueña con poder terminar su casa y tener un poco de comodidad con un negocio que no sea tan duro como el que actualmente tiene.
texts.en:
José is a 55-year-old gentleman who lives alone despite having children. He resides in Los Bancos, a rural canton that is part of Pichincha Province (where the Ecuadorian capital is also located). The entire area has many visitors because of its mountains, rivers, and biodiversity. A traditional dish is the "guaña" (also known as "campeche"), which is a fish that is eaten in a stew with plantains called "orito verde". This dish also includes marinated hearts of palm, tilapia, grilled steak, and sweet guava.

José is a man who does masonry and carpentry work. He learned these trades as a young man. His dream is to finish his house so that it can begin to appreciate in value. A loan will enable him to make a few repairs. This gentleman works very hard eight hours a day, Monday through Saturday. Even though he is a new client, the evaluation completed by Fundación Alternativa indicates that he will be able to complete his payments in a timely manner.

José also enjoys singing and playing the guitar. He dreams of finishing his house so that he will be a bit more comfortable and not have to work as hard in his business like he currently does now.

loans.use: to finish the repairs to his house and to buy chickens to raise and sell.

loans.name: Hermenes

texts.es:
Hermenes es padre de familia, vive con sus hijos y su esposa en casa propia, el caserío donde vive es pequeño y rural  el mismo que lleva por nombre “LAYNAS”, y pertenece al distrito de la MATANZA., cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su trabajo, es conocida por ser muy responsable con sus compromisos comerciales.
 
Hermenes se dedica a la venta de harina de jora y  en complemento a la venta de chicha desde hace 4 años en su propio domicilio, desde tempranas horas de todos los días prepara la chicha para la venta diaria, y es que esa actividad ha sido el sustento para su familia, pues es su esposa la que también participa en el negocio apoyándose ambos en las diferentes actividades a realizar para la atención a sus clientes.

Ahora esta solicitando un crédito en Edpyme Alternativa con el fin de implementar su negocio para generar mas ventas, el monto que solicita es de 1508 Nuevos Soles los que le servirán para la compra de maíz duro   otros insumos con los que pueda trabajar.

Es conocido por nuestra institución en la que ya ha tenido créditos anteriores y ha pagado de manera puntual.
texts.en:
Hermenes is a father who lives in his own home with his wife and children. The rural village where they live is small and is named "Laynas". It is part of the District of La Matanza. Hermenes has good personal and work-related references. In addition, he is known for being responsible in his business commitments.

Hermenes sells cornmeal and also "chicha" (a beverage made from corn). He started this business four years ago in his own home. Starting in the early morning hours, he prepares the "chicha" every day so that he can sell it. This business enables him to support his family. His wife also participates in the business and helps with both activities by attending to the customers.

Hermenes is now requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa so that his business will generate more sales. The amount of 1508 PEN that he is requesting will be used to buy hard corn and other supplies that he needs for his work. Since he has had previous loans, Hermenes is known within Edpyme Alternativa for submitting his payments in a timely manner.

loans.use: to buy corn and other supplies for his "chicha" business.

loans.name: Delfina

texts.en:
Delfina has been working with Asociación Arariwa for four years and is currently one of 14 members of the village bank “Los Alamos de la Estacion” located in the Andean highlands of Urcos, Cusco. Delfina is 39 years old and lives with her partner and four children, who are 6, 11, 14, and 19 years old.  She runs a restaurant that is open from 6 a.m. to 4 p.m. everyday. She says that her most popular dish is oven-baked trout. Delfina has been running her restaurant for five years.  Previously, she owned a small grocery store.

Delfina is requesting a loan in order to purchase table service supplies, such as plates, bowls, and utensils. Her dream is for all of her children to complete their studies and become professionals.

loans.use: buy plates, bowls, and utensils

loans.name: Valvina

texts.en:
Valvina is a 30-year-old single mother raising a 10-year-old daughter. She makes a living by selling chicken, lamb, and hot soups, usually from 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. On Sundays, she works in a restaurant as a service helper. Valvina is requesting a loan in order to purchase bowls and utensils to serve her customers. She hopes that the loan will allow her to improve her business and increase her sales of soup.
 
Valvina is one of 14 members of the village bank “Los Alamos de la Estacion” located in the Andean highlands of Urcos, Cusco.

loans.use: buy bowls and utensils

loans.name: Neila

texts.en:
Neila is a 19-year-old university student who is trying to finance her degree in international business administration. She has two years of university remaining ahead of her and would one day like to administer her own business. Neila is not sure what type of business she would like to run in the future. In the meantime, Neila is opening a restaurant that specializes in serving chicken. She has already found a storefront, but she needs a loan in order to pay for serving plates, bowls, utensils, tables, and an oven. With this loan, she hopes to continue supporting herself and her education.
 
Neila is one of 14 members of the village bank “Los Alamos de la Estacion” located in the Andean highlands of Urcos, Cusco.

loans.use: buy plates, bowls, utensils, tables, and an oven

loans.name: Tania

texts.en:
Tania runs a small grocery and general supply store from her house. In general, her store is open from 6 a.m. to 9 p.m. seven days a week. She has been running her business for about six years.  She would like a loan in order to purchase school supplies, which she can sell at the start of the new academic year. She plans to purchase inventory such as notebooks, pens, pencils, colored pencils, and paint.

Tania’s dream is to expand her small business into a minimarket, which will help her pay for her children’s education. At 33 years old, Tania is married and is raising a 10-year-old and a 13-year-old.

Tania is one of 14 members of the village bank “Los Alamos de la Estacion” located in the Andean highlands of Urcos, Cusco.

loans.use: buy school supplies

loans.name: Ronilda

texts.en:
Ronilda is 30 years old and is raising a 3-year-old and an 11-year-old with her partner.  She is a first grade teacher with about six years of experience in the classroom. She teaches a range of subjects, everything from mathematics to language skills, to her 30 students.

With the new academic year soon commencing, Ronilda is requesting a loan in order to purchase school supplies for her child, including a backpack and notebooks. She hopes that her children will have success in their studies, which will allow them to enjoy a comfortable and happy future.

Ronilda is one of 14 members of the village bank “Los Alamos de la Estacion” located in the Andean highlands of Urcos, Cusco.

loans.use: buy school supplies for her child

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys runs a food stand in the market, selling meals such as puchero, a Peruvian stew featuring potatoes, meat, and carrots. Prior to opening her stand, she operated a food kiosk at a school for many years. Her new business has been open for about two months, and she is requesting a loan in order to purchase cooking ingredients such as potatoes, meat, and vegetables. Her hope is to expand her business and one day own her own storefront. Gladys uses her income to support her family, which includes her husband, her 19-year-old son, and her 15-year-old daughter.

Gladys is one of 14 members of the village bank “Los Alamos de la Estacion” located in the Andean highlands of Urcos, Cusco.

loans.use: buy cooking ingredients

loans.name: Olivia Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina and her partner own a carpentry business, producing and selling furniture made from wood and iron as well as upholstered pieces such as sofas and armchairs. Together, they have a six-year-old daughter. They have been in the business for 15 years and rent a workshop from which they manufacture their pieces. 

Cristina is requesting a loan in order to purchase supplies such as wood, lacquer, and sealant, as well as to partially cover her employees’ salaries. As she continues to grow her business, she looks forward to one day owning her own studio and a store to exhibit her furniture. She would also like to begin exporting her furniture in the future.

Cristina is one of 14 members of the village bank “Los Alamos de la Estacion” located in the Andean highlands of Urcos, Cusco.

loans.use: buy furniture-making supplies and pay employees' salaries

loans.name: Pablo

texts.en:
Pablo is a construction worker who primarily works as a contractor on housing projects. He has been working in construction for 20 years. He is 46 years old and he and his wife have four children ranging in age from 12 to 24. Pablo is requesting a loan in order to purchase home improvement materials such as cement, iron, and plaster. One of his objectives is to add another little kitchen to his house. His hope is to provide a more comfortable living space for his family. 
 
Pablo is one of 14 members of the village bank “Los Alamos de la Estacion” located in the Andean highlands of Urcos, Cusco.

loans.use: buy home improvement materials

loans.name: Sonia Florentina

texts.en:
After selling fruit for many years, Sonia Florentina decided to open a restaurant nine months ago. She is 42 years old and is a single mother raising five children between the ages of 10 and 19. In her restaurant, she serves breakfast and a lunch with a set menu including soup and a main course. Some of her more popular dishes include soups of maize or pasta as well as beef stir fry.

Sonia Florentina would like a loan in order to purchase cooking ingredients for her restaurant such as potatoes and other vegetables, rice and oil. Her primary concern is to make sure there is food on the table for her children at every meal: breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
 
Sonia Florentina is one of 14 members of the village bank “Los Alamos de la Estacion” located in the Andean highlands of Urcos, Cusco.

loans.use: buy food ingredients

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
Jose Luis es un hombre que tiene 4 hijos, él y su esposa están dispuestos a muchas cosas porque sus hijos salgan adelante y puedan brindarles todo lo que necesitan, Jose Luis tiene actualmente 62 años y su edad no le impide trabajar y dar todo de sí día a día para poder ganarse el pan de cada mañana.

De joven deseaba poder estudiar Ingeniería civil pero por algunos motivos personales no pudo cumplir con este sueño debido a que sus padres no generaban los ingresos necesarios para poder solventar este tan costoso sueño. Después de este mal momento que Jose Luis sufrió, es como el decide iniciarse como maestro de obras, actividad a la que se dedica hasta la actualidad, trabajando desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde, el nos comenta que atiene a un promedio de 2 clientes en una semana debido a la cantidad de trabajo que le solicitan. El considera que las personas solicitan sus servicios porque realiza trabajos de calidad, buenos acabados y desde luego considera que la calidad es lo primero.

Con las distintas obras de construcción que ha realizado ha desgastado y mucho su herramientas y es por eso que necesita comprar algunas nuevas, también ha experimentado nuevos tipos de trabajos y es donde tiene mayores problemas porque hay algunas herramientas que le hacen falta y con el dinero prestado el podrá realizar las compras necesarias. El se ha trazado como meta que en 6 meses lograra trabajar en obras de construcción mucho más grandes y de esa manera incrementar sus ingresos lo que le permitirá abrir su propia pequeña empresa donde brindará distintos tipos de servicio de construcción, instalación y otros complementos que está dispuesto a aprender.
texts.en:
Jose Luis is a gentleman who has four children. He and his wife are willing to do many things so that their children can move forward and have everything they need. Jose Luis is currently 62 years of age, which has not stopped him from working. He gives his all every day so that he can earn his daily keep.

As a young man, Jose Luis wanted to study civil engineering, but due to a few personal reasons he was not able to fulfill this dream. His parents did not earn enough income to make this dream come true. After he went through this low moment, Jose Luis decided to become a master carpenter, the occupation that he currently practices. He works from 8am to 6pm. Jose Luis says that he has an average of two customers per week who request that he perform a number of jobs. People request his services because of the quality of his work and its fine finishes. Many consider his work to be first-rate.

The various construction jobs that he must complete are costly and require many tools. For this reason, he needs to buy a few new pieces of equipment. In addition, he has experimented with new types of jobs and has encountered major problems because some of his tools are defective. With the money being loaned to him, Jose Luis will be able to buy what he needs. The goal he has drawn up is to complete his construction jobs successfully within six months. This will increase his income so that he can open his own small business where he can provide all types of construction, installation, and other services that he is willing to learn.

loans.use: to buy tools.

loans.name: Wilmer Yoel

texts.es:
Wilmer es un joven de 21 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de chincha, la cual es identificada como la cuna del folclore afroperuano. Resaltan las manifestaciones culturales negras muy tradicionales, es un lugar acogedor con atractivos naturales como su pisco, el vino y sus rítmicos bailes al son del cajón peruano y el zapateo; asimismo se le conoce por la sazón de sus pobladores por la cocina, por ello uno de sus platos favoritos es la riquísima “sopa seca” en su tiempo libre le gusta ver televisión ya que lo relaja mucho.

Con mucho esfuerzo Wilmer logro tener su negocio de venta de pollos y huevos en el que actualmente trabaja, le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 12 horas, y se levanta muy temprano para poder abrir su negocio y poder vender sus productos, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque atiende de manera rápida a sus clientes y con mucha amabilidad.

Wilmer agradece mucho a los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo el podrá comprar mas mercaderia(pollos y huevo) para aperturar un nuevo local en el barrio donde vive, lo que le permitirá tener mayores ingresos y aumentar sus clientes, así se hará mas conocido y seguirá trabajando cada día para cumplir su más grande sueño:”  Tener un negocio más grande de venta de aves en general”.
texts.en:
Wilmer is a 21 year old man who lives in the city of Chincha, it is known as the birthplace of Afroperuvian folklore. There are many cultural and traditional rituals from the Afroperuvian population; it is also a welcoming place with natural attractions and its pisco (a type of grape brandy), wine and rhythmic dances with the beat of the cajón (a box shaped percussion instrument) and zapateo (a dance). The area is also known for its culinary zest and one of Wilmer’s favorite dishes is the delicious “sopa seca” (a dish of spaghetti and chicken). In his free time, Wilmer enjoys watching television because it relaxes him.

With a lot of hard work Wilmer was able to have his own business, selling chickens and eggs. He spends about 12 hours a day working as he wakes up very early to open his business and sell his products. Wilmer believes that he is doing his work well since he takes care of his customers quickly and kindly.

Wilmer is thankful to the Kiva lenders since thanks to your support he will be able to buy more merchandize (chickens and eggs) to open a new stall in the neighborhood where he lives which will allow him to have more income and increase his customers. That way, Wilmer will be better known and will keep working each day to make his greatest dream come true, “have a bigger business selling poultry.”

loans.use: buy merchandize (chickens and eggs).

loans.name: Flora

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Flora; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias trabajando en el lavado de ropa ,la socia lava ropa en las distintas casas que le solicitan sus servicios ,la socia trabaja todos los dias y solo por horas  en este negocio ,a la vez la socia cuenta con un carrito que ofrece el servicio de taxi siendo su esposo quien maneja este carrito y ella lo administra, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su carro.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This is Sra. Flora. She divides her time between her daily activities and her laundry business. Flora washes clothes by going to different homes that request her services. She works every day by herself in this business. Over time, she was able to buy a small car for providing taxi services. Her husband drives the vehicle, while she is in charge of managing it. Flora is a cheerful person who possesses tremendous desire to succeed.

She is requesting a loan for the maintenance of her car. Flora is pleased with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to pay for vehicle maintenance.

loans.name: Lorenzo

texts.es:
El señor Lorenzo se dedica a su negocio de cosecha y venta de maíz, desde hace mas de 30 años, es muy trabajador y disfruta mucho estar en los campos al cuidado de sus milpas, cuando el maíz esta listo para la venta  lo transporta en su vehículo a diferentes comunidades donde ya tiene sus clientes fijos, cuando el producto esta escaso el compra a otros vecinos  y vende,  generándole ingresos para poder sustentar a su familia quienes también le ayudan, en tiempos libres durante el día  se dedica a la venta de Leña.

Esta solicitando crédito por la cantidad de L. 12,000.00, para la compra de productos como ser Maíz y leña, espera que Prisma pueda apoyarle.
texts.en:
Lorenzo has harvested and sold corn for over 30 years. He is a hard worker and really enjoys being in the fields taking care of his crop. When the corn is ready to be sold, he transports it in his vehicle to different communities where he has fixed customers. 

When the product supply is limited, he buys from other neighbors and sells it, generating an income that allows him to take care of his family, who take care of him back. In his free time during the day he sells firewood. 

He is requesting the loan for 12,000.00 Lempiras to purchase products such as corn and firewood. He hopes that Prisma can support him.

loans.use: purchase products such as corn and firewood.

loans.name: Rema Group

texts.fr:
Aisha  fait partie du groupe Rema,  elle habite à  Bujumbura. Elle a 34 ans, elle est veuve. Elle a 2 enfants qui étudient, l’un a 12 ans l’autre 17 ans.

Elle est  commerçante de haricot, fruits,…depuis 14 ans.

Elle est à son troisième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de haricot, de fruits,… à revendre, pour gagner plus. 

Avec les bénéfices de son commerce, elle va payer les frais scolaires des enfants. Elle continuera à être client de Turame, jusqu'à acheter sa propre parcelle
texts.en: Aisha is a member of the Rema group and lives in Bujumbura.  She is 34 years old and a widow.  Her two children, age 12 and 17, both attend school.  She has been selling beans and fruits for fourteen years.  This is her third loan from Turame.  With the loan received from KIVA, she will increase her capital and buy large quantities of beans and fruits for resale, in order to get a better income.  With the profits from her business, she will pay school fees for her children.  She will continue to work with Turame until she can buy her own plot.

loans.use: to increase her capital, buy large quantities of beans and fruits for resale, and get a better income.

loans.name: Shirahamwe Group

texts.fr:
Anastasie fait partie du groupe Shirahamwe.  Elle habite à Gitega. Elle  a 56 ans  et elle veuve.Elle a 2 enfants l'un a 7ans et l'autre 16 ans,ils étudient tous.

Elle est commerçante de tomates depuis 20 ans.Elle pratique aussi l'agriculture 

Elle est à son huitième crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va augmenter son capital et acheter beaucoup de paniers de tomates à revendre afin de gagner plus.
texts.en:
Anastasie is a member of group Shirahamwe. She lives in Gitega. She is 56 years old and widowed. She has two children, a seven-year-old and a sixteen-year-old. They both go to school.

She has been a retailer of tomatoes for 20 years. She is also a farmer.

She is on her eighth loan with Turame. With the loan granted by KIVA, she will increase her capital and purchase many baskets of tomatoes to retail in order to earn more.

loans.use: increase her capital and purchase many baskets of tomatoes to retail in order to increase her profits.

loans.name: Vahasi Group

texts.fr:
Salvator fait partie du groupe Vahasi. Il habite à Gitega,et est âgé de 29 ans. Il est marié à Lydia, cultivartice.Ensemble ils ont 1 enfant de 3 ans.

Il est  plombier de formation depuis 6 ans. 

Il est à son troisième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il va  augmenter son capital et acheter  d’autres pièces de rechange de déplomberie,pour revendre. 

Lorsqu’il aura un grand capital il  apprendra à sa femme à faire le commerce au marché.
texts.en:
Salvator is a member of group Vahasi. He lives in Gitega, and is 29 years old. He is married to Lydia, a farmer. Together they have one three-year-old child. He is a plumber by training, and has been practicing for six years.

He is on his third loan with Turame. With the loan granted by KIVA, he will increase his capital and purchase other plumbing spare parts to resell.

When he will have more capital, he will teach his wife how to retail on the market.

loans.use: increase his capital and purchase other plumbing spare parts to resell.

loans.name: Girumwete Group

texts.fr:
Furaha fait partie du groupe  Girumwete, elle habite à Gitega. Elle est âgée de 42 ans .Elle est veuve. Elle a 4 enfants, âgés de 10 à 21 ans, dont 2 étudient.

Elle fait le commerce des produits vivriers (pomme de terre,colocase, banane, avocats, patate douce, etc. 

Elle est à son 17  crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter beaucoup de produits vivriers (pomme de terre, colocase,banane, patate douce,..), à revendre ,pour gagner plus.

Les gains de son commerce lui permettront d’améliorer la ration alimentaire, payer les soins de santé, payer le loyer.
texts.en:
Furaha is a member of the Girumwete group and lives in Gitega.  She is 42 years old.  She is a widow with four children between the ages of 10 and 21, two of whom attend school.  

She sells produce (potatoes, taro, bananas, avocados, sweet potatoes, etc.).

She is on her 17th loan with Turame.  With her Kiva loan she will increase her working capital and stock up on produce (potatoes, taro, bananas, sweet potatoes) to sell in order to make more money.   

The profits from her business will allow her to provide more food for her family, cover health care expenses, and pay the rent.

loans.use: to increase her working capital and stock up on produce (potatoes, taro, bananas, sweet potatoes) to sell.

loans.name: Diogenes

texts.es:
Diógenes, de 45 años es un hombre bueno, amable y emprendedor. Convive con Dora de 43 años con quien tiene seis hijos, tres de ellos  ya son mayores e independientes, mientras que los tres aún son menores, y por tanto desea trabaja mucho para brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. El trabajo de Diógenes consiste en la compra y venta de vehículos, entre ellos motos y  moto taxis ya usados, es así que él está presto a esperar un comprador y ofrecerle un precio justo. Sus vehículos al momento de adquirirlos los restauran y los deja en buen estado para venderlos a sus clientes. Su local está ubicado en su casa, dicho negocio lo viene realizando por más de  cinco años. Le gusta mucho lo que hace ya que le permite tener buenos ingresos a parte de darle el tiempo suficiente para dedicarse a otras actividades. Trabaja solo y tiene como planes muchas cosas, pero por mientras solo desea seguir trabajando hasta juntar el capital suficiente para instalar una tienda de repuestos y vender vehículos nuevos. Este será el primer préstamo con MFP, está muy contento de saber que tendrá un respaldo económico a través del préstamo que le otorgaran ya que así podrá concretar algunos planes que tiene para su negocio. Por otro lado se compromete en ser un socio cumplido y a pagar a tiempo sus cuotas de manera puntual ya que quiere compenetrarse rápido con su grupo  banco comunal del cual tiene buenas referencias que son muy solidarios y puntuales.
Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprará piezas y repuestos para arreglar algunos moto taxis que tienen y que están en espera de ser vendidos.
texts.en:
Diógenes, who is 45 years old, is a good, kind, and entrepreneurial man. He lives with Dora, who is 43 years old, with whom he has six children. Three of them are already adults and are independent, while the other three are minors, and for that reason he wants to work hard to offer a better quality of life to his family. Diógenes' work consists of the purchase and sale of vehicles, including used motorcycles and mototaxis (motorcycles that area converted into taxis), thus he is willing to wait for a buyer and offer him a fair price. As soon as he buys his vehicles, he restores them and leaves them in good condition to sell to his customers. His shop is located in his home, and he has had this business for more than five years. He likes what he does a lot since it allows him to have a good income, apart from giving him sufficient time for other activities. He works alone and has plans for many things, but for now his only desire is to continue working until he has saved enough capital to set up a repair shop and sell new vehicles. This will be his first loan with MFP. He is very happy to know that he will have economic backing through the loan that they are offering him, since he will thus be able to make definite some plans that he has for his business. Furthermore, he promises to be a reliable member and to make his payments punctually, since he wants to enter fully and quickly into the spirit of his communal bank, for which he has good references that they are very united and punctual.

With the 1000 PEN that he has applied for, he will buy parts to repair some mototaxis that he has and that are waiting to be sold.

loans.use: to buy parts to repair mototaxis

loans.name: Dushigikirane Group

texts.fr:
Jeanine fait partie du groupe Dushigikirane, elle habite à Gitega, Elle est âgée de 25 ans et est mariée à Assoumani. Ensemble ils ont  2 enfants, l’un a 3 ans et l’autre 5 ans. L’aîné étudie à l'école maternelle.

Elle fait le commerce de boutique (riz, savon, sucre,…)

Elle est à son troisième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle  va  augmenter son capital et acheter beaucoup d’articles de sa boutique (riz, savons, sucre,…)

Les gains de son commerce lui permettront d’améliorer la ration alimentaire, payer les frais de scolarité ainsi que les soins de santé.
texts.en:
Jeanine is a member of group Dushigikirane. She resides in Gitega, and is 25 years old. She is married to Assoumani. Together, they have two children: one is three and the other is five years old. The older attends kindergarten.

She is in the retailing business (rice, soap, sugar…)

She is on her third loan with Turame. With the KIVA loan granted her, she is going to increase her capital and purchase many items for her shop (rice, soap, sugar…)

The profit from her business will allow her to improve the quality of the food ration and to pay for school expenses as well as for health care.

loans.use: to increase her capital and buy many items for her shop (rice, soap, sugar...)

loans.name: Hoeurm's Group

texts.en:
Hoeurm, 32, is married and lives with her four dependent children, who are still in school, in a rural area located in the Ratanak Mondul district. Her family earns a living by farming corn and mung beans as their main source of income. Hoeurm has been in this business for almost ten years. 

Hoeurm has been with VisionFund for one year and completely repaid her prior loan, which has made her standard of living better. She and her fellow group member, who just joined VisionFund, are applying for a loan of 1,200,00 and 1,000,000 Cambodian riels (KHR), respectively. As the leader, Hoeurm plans to use her portion of the loan to buy fertilizer for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to grow her plants healthfully and improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer for farmland

loans.name: Azra's Group

texts.en:
Azra has requested a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband’s motor mechanic business. He is an expert in auto repair and, due to his good quality services, his customers are loyal to him and trust his services. Azra's husband will use this loan to buy some repair tools and spare parts to provide better quality services to his clients.

Azra is a housewife who stays at home and does her household responsibilities. She is the mother of a son and a daughter. Her son is studying and her daughter is only 3 years old. Azra has a lot of trust in her husband and is confident that his business will improve further after the loan investment.

Note: In the photo, Azra is holding a book (the Asasah Passbook).

loans.use: To buy repair tools

loans.name: Albert

texts.en: From the town of Yerevan where he lives with his wife, two children and parents, Albert has been a shoe maker for the past four years. In order to make and sell more shoes and increase his business income, Albert is requesting a loan to purchase leather. With the additional income he will be able to improve the living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to pay for leather.

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a fifty-two-year-old man. He is a father with five sons and four daughters. Three of his sons are workers with low salaries, the rest are secondary school students. Mahmoud is a worker with low income, which is not enough to cover the family's needs and the school costs. 

Mahmoud is requesting a loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of secondary school education for his sons. This will enable Mahmoud's sons to continue their studies and ensure themselves a bright future and the ability to improve the family's conditions. 

Mahmoud is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: To pay the secondary school costs for his sons.

loans.name: Xaverine

texts.en:
Xaverine is 67 years old and is married. Her business is well-organized. She sells beer and works from 7 a.m. until 10 p.m. every day. Xaverine has two years of experience in her business.

Xaverine has requested a loan from Kiva partner Vision Finance Company in order to expand her business by buying more types of beer for resale, such as Winne, Mutsing, Red Blue, and Primus. With the profit from the loan, Xaverine will be able to buy more food for her family and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To purchase more beer for resale

loans.name: Cyprien

texts.en:
Cyprien, 29 years old, is married and has two children, aged 6 and 9. He has owned and operated a welding business for 8 years. He works from 7 a.m. until 7 p.m. every day except Saturday. Cyprien currently employs four people to help him.

Cyprien has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase various materials and more machines for his welding business. He will use any profits generated from this loan to save for his future and to reinvest in his business.

loans.use: To purchase various materials and more machines for his welding business.

loans.name: Waa'd

texts.en: Waa'd is a 20-year-old single young woman. She lives with her parents who work in agriculture, which is the only source of income for the family. Waa'd's parents are preparing to have a new growing season by using a greenhouse for this purpose. Waa'd is requesting a 3,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help her parents cover the cost of repairing and improving the condition of the greenhouse. This will offer them a valid greenhouse to use for agriculture and the ability to prepare well for the coming agricultural season. This will offer them a better crop to sell and increase the family's income. Waa'd is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: To pay the cost of repairing her old greenhouse to use it for agricultural purposes.

loans.name: Rami

texts.en: Rami is a 21-year-old single man who is a university student and an employee at a private company. Rami lives with his parents. They have a small farm near their house and want to grow almond and olive trees. Rami is requesting a $1,500 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the cost of purchasing the seedlings and improving the farm. This will benefit Rami and his family in the near future when they are able to eat their crops. Rami is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: To purchase almond and olive seedlings

loans.name: C3763 Ukuri Group

texts.en:
Delphine is 39 years old and married. She has two children between the ages of 3 and 4 years old. Her business is well organized and she sells small livestock. Delphine is a leader of this group, which is called "C3763 UKURI." In English, this means "truth." Delphine is the third person from the left. She works at her business from 5am until 6pm every day. She has 12 years of experience. 

Delphine has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to expand her small livestock sales business by buying more animals for resale. With any profit, she will be able to pay her children's school fees and to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To buy more animals for resale

loans.name: Selvin Heraldo

texts.es:
El señor Selvin tiene 29 años de edad, vive con su compañera de vida y una hija. Desde hace 20 años se dedica a realizar las actividades agrícolas, fue de sus padres que aprendió a sembrar fríjol y a realizar  las actividades agrícolas. 

 Lo que más desea él, es brindarles un lugar donde vivir mejor a su familia, ya que viven en una casa de lámina. Por eso el se sacrifica todos los días, se levanta a las 4:00 a.m. a ordeñar y darle de comer a sus animales, para luego irse a trabajar a sus parcelas de tierra que están a siete kilómetros de distancia de donde vive, durante todo el día.

Selvin tiene que viajar para comprar insumos como semilla y fertilizantes, en una ciudad que esta a sesenta minutos de su hogar en autobús.

Él solicita un préstamo para comprar cinco novillos para repasto ya que después de sacar la cosecha queda el rastrojo para el ganado. Dice que esta inversión será de gran ayuda ya que podrá obtener buenas ganancias y puede dejar las mejores novillas para vacas. De esta manera incrementara la producción de leche ya que venderá unas y las otra las dejara para darle el sustento a su familia. 

Selvin sueña con construir una casa digna para su familia y brindarles una buena educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Señor Selvin is 29 years old. He lives with his life companion and one daughter. He has been involved in agricultural activities for 20 years. it was from his parents that he learned to plant beans and carry out other agricultural tasks.

What he wants most is to offer his family a better place to live, since they live in a house made of laminate (sheets of metal or other material). For this, he sacrifices every day. He gets up at 4:00 am to milk and feed his animals, then he goes out to work all day on his parcels of land, which are seven kilometers from where he lives.

Selvin has to travel to buy items such as seeds and fertilizers in a city that is 60 minutes from his home by bus.

He is applying for a loan to buy five young bulls to pasture, since after the harvest the stubble will remain for the livestock. He says that this investment will be a great help, since he will be able to obtain better earnings and he can let the best female calves grow into cows. In this way he will increase the production of milk, since he will sell some and leave the rest to give sustenance to his family.

Selvin dreams of constructing a worthy house for his family and offering a good education to his children.

loans.use: to buy five young bulls to pasture

loans.name: Arman

texts.en:
Arman is 32 years old. He lives in Agarak village with his parents and sister. Arman is engaged in agriculture. He keeps cattle and cultivates land.

Arman has applied for this loan to purchase potato seeds and cattle forage. He hopes to gather a good harvest of potatoes and garner additional income from the sales. This will help Arman have the means to invest in the farm's further expansion. Arman plans to increase the number of cattle in the future.

loans.use: to pay for potato seeds and cattle forage

loans.name: Him's Group

texts.en:
Originally from a village of the Moung Russey district, Him is a 42-year-old mother of four dependent children: one daughter and three sons who all are still in school. To make a living, she and her husband farm rice on their own one-hectare farmland and they have been in this business for 15 years. To better feed the family, she sometimes works for others for pay while her husband catches fishes for food and sale. 

This is the fourth loan for Him’s group and they successfully paid back the loan with VisionFund. Since 2009, the loan has helped her have some savings and send her children to school regularly. She now earns less than US$5 per day and saves almost US$1.5 each day. Now requesting another loan, she is going to use this loan to buy corn seed and fertilizer for her farmland. This loan will enable her to increase her business and earn more income to make a living better and also keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy corn seed and fertilizer for farmland

loans.name: Innocent

texts.en:
Innocent, 44 years old, is married and has six children aged between 4 and 16 years old. He owns a sewing business, which operates from 7 a.m. to 6 p.m. six days per week. He currently employs three people to help him.

Innocent has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to expand his sewing business by buying various materials. He plans to use any profits generated from this loan to satisfy his family's basic needs, to reinvest in his business, to pay his children's school fees and to renovate his house.

loans.use: To expand his sewing business by buying various materials.

loans.name: Walaa

texts.en:
Walaa is a 24-year-old young woman who is married with no children yet. Her husband is a private sector employee who gets a low salary. For the past year, Walaa has been selling clothes, which has been a profitable project.

Walaa is requesting a 2,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help her cover the cost of purchasing a collection of clothes to resell. This will increase sales and improve the family's income. Walaa appears in the photograph.

loans.use: To purchase a collection of clothes to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To expand his pub by buying various drinks and food to sell.

loans.name: Fadia

texts.en:
Fadia is a conservative woman who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in her Kiva profile picture photographed in a FATEN branch. Fadia is a 24-year-old young woman, and a mother of one son and one daughter. Her husband is employed but gets a low salary which is not enough to cover the family's needs. 

Fadia is requesting a USD 2,000 youth loan from FATEN to help cover her costs for purchasing new home furniture such as bedroom furniture for her children and a computer for personal use. This will help improve the family's home living conditions.

loans.use: To purchase new home furniture and a computer for personal use.

loans.name: Alaa

texts.en:
Alaa is a conservative woman who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband Rami appears in her Kiva profile photo. 

Alaa is a young woman of twenty-four. She is a mother with two daughters. Her husband Rami is a employed, but gets a low salary, but one that is not enough to cover the family's costs. 

Alaa wants to complete her house so she will live in better conditions with the family. She wants to do works such as: painting, installing tiles, installing windows etc. Alaa is requesting a 2,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of finishing her house. This will create better home-living conditions for Alaa and her family.

loans.use: To finish her house.

loans.name: Hanaa

texts.en:
Hanaa is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in her Kiva profile photo. Hanaa is a 28-year-old woman, a mother with two sons and one daughter. Her husband is employed, but gets a low salary which is not enough to cover the family's expenses.

 Hanaa is requesting a 3,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help her cover the cost of purchasing new necessary home furniture instead of the very old furnishings, such as: bedroom furniture, dining room furniture, living room seats. This will offer Hanaa and her family better and more comfortable home furniture and this will reflect positively on their living conditions.

loans.use: To change the old home furniture and purchase new furnishings.

loans.name: Casilda Petronila

texts.es:
La señora es casada tiene 50 años de edad,  cursó los estudios de educacion primaria, tiene 4 hijos 3 de los cuales están estudiando, se dedica al comercio a la venta de ropa par mujeres, blusas, cortes y suéteres, inició como operaria y hasta el momento lleva 1 año de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo para invertirlo como capital de trabajo en la compra de mercaderías: cortes, suéteres blusas, y mas. Espera en le futuro tener un negocio amplio.
texts.en:
Casilda is married.  She is 50 years old.  She studied elementary education.  She has 4 children, 3 of whom are in school.  She sells women's clothing: shirts, shorts, and sweaters.  She began as a worker, and she currently has 1 year of experience.

She is asking for a loan to invest as working capital in the purchase of merchandise: shorts, sweaters, shirts, and more.  She hopes to have an ample business in the future.

loans.use: buy shorts, sweaters, shirts, and more.

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en:
Jacqueline, 36 years old, is married and has four children aged between 5 and 16 years old. Her business is well-organized. She sells meat, working from 6 a.m. until 6 p.m. every day except Sunday. Jacqueline has six years of experience in this business and she currently employs four people to help her. 

Jacqueline has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase large quantities of meat for resale. She will use any profit generated from this loan to renovate her own house and to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To purchase large quantities of meat for resale.

loans.name: Asmaa

texts.en:
Asmaa is a 28-year-old woman, a mother with one son. Her husband is a taxi driver who gets a low income, but not enough to cover all the family's expenses. 

For the past three years, Asmaa and her husband have also been raising and selling sheep and sheep products, which has been a profitable project.

Asmaa is requesting a 1,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help her cover the cost of purchasing more sheep and expanding and improving the herd's condition. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.

Asmaa is photographed in the picture.

loans.use: To purchase sheep and expand the herd.

loans.name: José Augusto

texts.es:
El señor José tiene 62 años de edad, vive con su compañera de vida y tiene ocho hijos. Desde los 9 años de edad se ha dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería, lo aprendió de su padre pues él se dedicaba a lo mismo.  

Todos los insumos agrícolas, los compra en una ciudad del oriente del país, para darle mantenimiento al ganado que cuida. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo es para comprar dos novillas, ya que es una persona que trabaja con ganado y las novillas las comprara para crecerlas y negociarlas después. Él ha pensado negociar con ganado y obtener con ello ingresos, al mismo tiempo que aumentara su patrimonio ya que siempre ha querido tener su propio ganado y producir productos lácteos como leche, queso, etc.
texts.en:
José is 62 years old, lives with his domestic partner, and has eight children. Since the age of 9, he has worked in farming and livestock. He learned these trades from his father as he made a living this way too. He buys all the agricultural supplies to maintain the cattle he cares for in a city in the eastern part of the country. 

He is requesting a loan from Fundación Campo to buy two heifers since he is a person who works with cattle. He would buy the heifers to raise them and sell them later. He has thought about trading in cattle and earning income this way. At the same time he would increase his assets, as he has always wanted to have his own cattle and make dairy products like milk, cheese, etc.

loans.use: to buy two heifers.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
El señor Pedro tiene 37 años de edad, vive con su compañera de vida y cuatro hijos entre las edades de 18 a 10 años de edad. Es una persona trabajadora que se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 10 años, sus padres fueron los que le enseñaron a realizar estas actividades y gracias a ellos hoy es una persona exitosa en los cultivos maíz, pipían, plátano y otros. Que son a través de ellos que recibe ingresos para su familia.

Él viaja durante cuarenta y cinco minutos en autobús, para llegar a la ciudad en donde compra los insumos agrícolas. El préstamo que solicita será para comprar 6  sacos de sulfato, y 3 sacos de formula para sembrar 10,500 metros cuadrados de maíz. De esta manera tendrá una buena producción, para mejorar sus ingresos y pagar el crédito y con el resto seguir trabajando.

En un futuro el quiere aumentar la cantidad de terreno cultivado y con diferentes cultivos, para obtener ingresos suficientes para brindarle el estudio a sus tres hijos más pequeños.
texts.en:
Pedro is 37 years old, and lives with his life partner and four children between the ages of 18 and 10.  He is a hard-working person who has worked in agriculture for 10 years.  His parents taught him how to perform this activity, and thanks to them, today he is successful at growing corn, squash, plantains and other crops.  It is due to them that he earns income for his family.

He travels for forty-five minutes by bus to get to the city where he buys his agricultural supplies.  The loan he is requesting will be used to buy 6 bags of sulphate, and 3 bags of fertilizer to seed 10,500 square metres of corn.  In this way he will produce a good grop, to improve his income and repay his loan, and with the rest continue working.

In the future he would like to increase the amount of land he cultivates and grow different crops, to earn enough income to offer an education to his three youngest children.

loans.use: to buy six sacks of sulfate and three sacks of fertilizer to plant 10,500 square meters of corn.

loans.name: Sa'ed

texts.en:
Sa'ed is a twenty-four-year-old young man. He is employed, but gets a low salary. Sa'ed is preparing to marry soon. His salary isn't enough to cover the wedding expenses as he wants to purchase bedroom furniture and living room furniture. 

Sa'ed is requesting a loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing the necessary home furniture to prepare a suitable home to live in with his wife. Sa'ed is photographed in the FATEN branch office.


About this loan product:
FATEN offers loans that are customized for Muslim borrowers. A key principle of Islam is the prohibition of charging interest on a loan. This prohibition is based on the belief that money is only a medium of exchange and has no value in itself. In order to offer loans in a manner that is consistent with borrowers' values, FATEN charges 0% interest on this loan. However, FATEN does charge a servicing fee to cover its costs. The loan amount you see listed on Kiva includes both the principal loan and the loan servicing fees. As with all Kiva loans, you should expect to have your funds returned to you according to this loan’s repayment schedule. For more information on lending in the Muslim world, please click here.

loans.use: To purchase new home furniture.

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es:
El señor Juan tiene 72 años de edad, vive con su compañera de vida y dos hijos. Desde los 12 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura, él proviene de una familia numerosa son 7 hermanos por lo que trabajo desde muy pequeño, a los 17 años de edad se acompaño y procreo dos hijos con mucho esfuerzo a uno de ellos le dio el estudio hasta que se pudo graduar, su compañera de vida y sus hijos luchan día a día en la agricultura junto a él. 

Los insumos agrícolas, los compra en el lugar más cercano a su residencia, tiene que pagar una mototaxi para transportarlos a su vivienda ya que esta a unos dos kilómetros de distancia del lugar donde los compra.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo es para comprar una yunta de bueyes (dos bueyes) para el cultivo agrícola, con la inversión mejorara el rendimiento y mejorara la disponibilidad en la agricultura. Él desea continuar trabajando y mejorando sus ingresos, cultivando otra variedad de productos agrícolas.
texts.en:
Juan is 72 years old, he lives with his life partner and two children. He has worked in agriculture since he was 12 years old. He comes from a very large family of 7 siblings, so he has worked since he was very small. At age 17, he met his partner and had two children. It was with a lot of effort that he gave an education to one of them until he was able graduate. His life partner and children struggle daily in the agriculture sector along with him. 

He buys agricultural supplies at the closest place to his home. He has to pay for a moto-taxi to transport them to his house because it is about two kilometers away from where he purchases the supplies.

The loan he is requesting from Fundación Campo will be used to buy a yoke of oxen (two oxen) for agricultural farming. With the investment, he will improve his yield and his ability in agriculture. He wishes to continue working and improving his income, cultivating other varieties of agricultural products.

loans.use: to buy a yoke of oxen (two oxen) for agricultural farming.

loans.name: Mujeres De La Cienaga Group

texts.es:
La señora Marta es casada, tiene 41 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 4 hijos 3 de los cuales está estudiando la educación primaria, se dedica al bordado de blusas y a la crianza de animales, inicio este negocio de bordado por iniciativa propia, con poco capital y prestado y hasta el momento lleva 5 años de experiencia.

Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un préstamo que le servirá para la compra de materiales para bordado, en este caso telas y así producir mas bordados, y mejorar sus ganancias. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedica a diversas actividades: Confección y bordado de blusas, venta de refacciones y a la crianza de animales.
texts.en:
Marta is married, she is 41 years old, she did not have the chance to study, and she has 4 children, 3 of whom are attending primary school. She embroiders blouses and breeds animals. She started the embroidery activity out of her own initiative, with a small working capital she had been lent, and she has 5 years of experience in this field.

She has organized a group in order to request a loan that she will use to buy supplies for her embroidery activity. In this occasion she will buy cloths in order to embroider more items and increase her income. The other members of the group engages in different activities such as creating and embroidering blouses, selling snacks and animal breeding.

loans.use: To buy cloths to embroider.

loans.name: Heidie

texts.en:
Heidie is a 34-year-old married woman with two children. She is in the business of selling a variety of meats such as beef, pork and chicken. She has been in this business for five years. She wakes up early in the morning every day to prepare her products for the market. She even wakes up at 3 o'clock in the morning every Saturday (market day). The earlier she prepares her products for her allotted place at the market, the greater the opportunity to dispose of her products early.

To produce high sales and earn high income, she is requesting a loan of 10,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to purchase dressed chicken, beef and pork. This will bring in good profit as well as attract customers because of the different choices of meats. She hopes to provide a better living through her chosen business and save for the future of her two children.

loans.use: to purchase dressed chicken, beef and pork

loans.name: Maria Belen

texts.es:
Maria es una persona muy trabajadora que junto con su esposo ha podido sacar adelante su familia. Maria es madre de 4 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar una mejor calidad de vida, además de querer ofrecerles un buen estudio y una buena estabilidad económica. Maria trabaja junto con su esposo en su negocio que es un estadero donde además tienen una tienda donde venden toda clase de productos de la canasta familiar. Gracias a esto genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Con el ánimo de hacer más atractivo su negocio para los clientes, Maria quiere realizar algunas adecuaciones locativas y surtir su negocio con más mercancía. Debido a que no cuenta con el capital suficiente para realizar esto, Maria tiene el anhelo de que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a realizar adecuaciones locativas a su negocio y a la compra de productos de la canasta familiar para mejorar el surtido del negocio.

Maria espera que su negocio siga vendiendo lo suficiente para poder seguir generando los ingresos para su hogar, además de que quiere mejorarles la calidad de vida a su esposo y sus 4 hijos. Maria sueña con tener una gran tienda donde pueda ofrecer todos los productos de la canasta familiar y pueda ser un referente, el cual luego se convierta en un gran supermercado.
texts.en:
Maria is a very hard worker, who along with her husband, has been able to get her family ahead.  Maria is the mother of 4 children, for whom she has always wanted to provide a better quality of life. She also wants to provide them with a good education and financial stability.  

Maria works with her husband in an inn, where they also have a store in which they sell all types of household products.  Thanks to this, they generate the necessary income to sustain their home.  

With the hopes of making their business more attractive to customers, Maria wants to make some upgrades and supply her business with more merchandise.  Because she does not have enough capital to do this, Maria hopes that a loan will provide her with the opportunity to access and make the upgrades to her business and purchase household products to improve her business' supply.  She hopes that her business will continue selling enough to generate income for the household, in addition to improving the quality of life of her husband and 4 children.  

Maria dreams of having a large store that can offer all types of household products and be a household name which will eventually become a large supermarket.

loans.use: to make upgrades and to buy household products in order to improve the range of products sold in her business.

loans.name: Nche George

texts.en:
Nche George is a polygamist with ten children and they all live in a four-room house in Mbienfebie Mankon, a quarter in the Mezam division in the northwest region of Cameroon.  He has faced so many challenges in life, including the sudden death of family members, being unable to pay his children's  school fees, and also marital problems. The father who was supportive to him died because of a tetanus infection, which causes him more frustration.

Given a loan, Nche George will add his personal contribution and buy a motorbike, which will be used for commercial transportation.  He strongly believes his business will succeed because he is a competent rider, there is longevity in the transportation business, and there is need for the transportation business in his community. With this business, the community will benefit from the transport of farm produce from the farm to the market,  It will facilitate movement in the community, transportat people to their job sites, and it will help to transport student to far distant schools.  

Many things have happen in his life which he hates thinking about, including the sudden death of his father.  Nche George says the profit from the loan will be used to educate his children, buy parts for the motorbike that are broken or missing, and saved to undertake bigger investments.  He prefer a loan from GHAPE because the interest rate is low, repayment term is encouraging, and the education given on better loan management and organization is reliable.

loans.use: buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro, trabaja como Chofer propietario y pertenece a un sindicato en la ciudad de La Paz.
El crédito lo requiere para el mantenimiento de su vehiculo ya que es el único ingreso que tiene para mantener a su hijo.
Pedro vive en la casa de sus padres, en la zona Villa Copacabana de la ciudad de La Paz.
Es la segunda vez que trabaja con IMPRO y la segunda junto a KIVA.
texts.en:
Pedro works as a driver with his own vehicle for a union in the city of La Paz.

He needs the loan for vehicle maintenance.  This is the only source of income that he has to support his child.

Pedro lives in his parents’ house in the Villa Copacabana area of the city of La Paz.

This is the second time that he has worked with IMPRO, and it is the second time that he has worked with Kiva.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on the vehicle he uses for passenger transportation.

loans.name: Entesar

texts.en:
Entesar is a 50-year-old married woman from Al Baqa’a, Jordan and a mother of six children.

Entesar is looking to improve her family's living conditions thus she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase new furniture with an aspiration of adding new rooms to the house.

Entesar is looking to build an additional floor for her son so that he can live in when he get married.

loans.use: to do house maintenance

loans.name: Ammar

texts.en:
Ammar, a 23-year-old single guy, is the oldest among his seven brothers and sisters.

His father is a self-employed person, and it is really a struggle for him to raise money for schools for Ammar and his siblings. So Ammar decided to start by registering in a college to get a diploma in telecommunications engineering and after that continue his studies on his own to get a Bachelor’s degree in the same field.

Amman also wants to find a job so he can support himself during his studies and help his father in supporting the family. But for now, Ammar has applied for a loan in order to pay for his next semester fees.

loans.use: to pay for his next semester fees.

loans.name: Melvin Enrrique

texts.es:
Melvin, tiene 29 años de edad, es casado, tiene 3 hijos, los cuales están estudiando, vive en la Aldea La Pita de Puerto Cortes.
Melvin trabajaba en una maquila como operario y esta empresa cerro operaciones, al ver que no tenia empleo decidió invertir sus ahorros en su propio negocio. Estableció una pequeña pulpería donde vende productos de primera necesidad, como ser granos básicos, lácteos, churros, refrescos, pan, etc. este negocio tiene 3 años de funcionar y ahora esta mas surtido.
Esta solicitando un préstamo para seguir surtiendo, con el cual va comprar refrescos, churros, pan,  dulces y otros, que permitirá obtener los ingresos necesarios para el hogar. El espera mejorar su calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Melvin is 29 years old and is married.  He has three children who are still in school, and he lives in the La Pita village in Puerto Cortes.

Melvin used to work in a factory as an operator, but this business ceased operations.  On seeing that he couldn't find employment, he decided to invest his savings into his own business. He established a small convenience store where he sells everyday products such as basic grains, dairy products, churros (similar to doughnuts), sodas, bread, etc.  This business has been up and running for three years, and now has more merchandise.

He is requesting a loan to continue stocking up, with which he will purchase sodas, churros, bread, sweets and other things, which will allow him to earn the necessary income for his household.  He is hoping to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to stock up his business with everyday household groceries: basic grains, dairy products, sodas, churros (similar to doughnuts), bread, etc.

loans.name: Mayson

texts.en:
Mayson is a conservative person and she is unwilling to have her picture uploaded on the internet, thus the man in the photo is her husband, Haydar.

Mayson is a 44-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan and a mother of four children.

Mayson sells clothes and is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase more quantities of clothes for business purposes.

Mayson is looking to establishing a shop for her business and thus increase her income and provide better living conditions to her family.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes for business purposes

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is a 26-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan and a mother of four children.

Amal does hand-made embroidery and she is requesting a youth loan of 500 JD to purchase raw materials needed for her home-based project (fabrics, thread, etc.)

Amal is looking to improve her business and increase her customer base.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials needed for her embroidery business ( fabrics, thread, etc.)

loans.name: Waloo Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité Waloo a été créé le 9 juillet 2011, il est composé de quinze femmes qui sont unies par des liens de voisinage et ont une activité commune le petit commerce.

La responsable Maïmouna  est âgée de 51 ans,elle est mariée mère de  huit enfants, elle a en charge aussi trois enfants orphelins de sa défunte sœur; elle fait du petit commerce de friperie et  de fruits de saisons, elle capitalise une bonne expérience de 6 ans. Elle est à droite habillée en Khartoum bleu-blanc avec un livret à la main.
Elle achéte les fruits( mangues, oranges, pastèque.....)friperie au marché central de la ville et revend sur place.

Elle compte avec son prêt renforcer son activité pour attirer une grande clientèle pour ainsi se faire plus de revenus.
Elle appui son mari dans la scolarité des enfants et leur habillement.
texts.en:
The Waloo solidarity group was created on 9 July 2011. It is made up of 15 women who are all neighbours and small-scale retailers.

The head of the group is Maïmouna. She is 51 years old and married with 8 children. She also cares for her late sister's three children. 

Her business is selling second-hand clothing and seasonal fruit, and she benefits from 6 years experience. She is pictured on the right wearing blue and white Khartoum cloth and holding a booklet.

Maïmouna buys and resells the fruit (mangoes, oranges, watermelons, etc.) and the second-hand clothing at the central market. With her loan she is planning to strengthen her business in order to attract many customers and increase her revenue. She helps her husband pay for her children's school fees and clothing.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothes and seasonal fruit for resale

loans.name: Duo Santa Teresita Group

texts.es:
DUO SANTA TERESITA
Integrada por doña Marta, de 36 años y su suegra doña Justa de 62 años de edad quien desde hace 15 años se ha dedicado a la venta de tortillas en su domicilio, doña Marta tiene en su domicilio su pequeño negocio de venta de consumo diario como también un molino de nixtamal, doña Marta desde las 6 de la mañana atiende a sus clientes en su mayoría a las señoras que llegan a moler su nixtamal y a la vez compra de pan para sus niños que viajan a la escuela,ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de productos de consumo diario ya que nececita surtir mas su tienda el esposo de ambas se dedican a la agricultura en la siembra de flores y verduras por lo cual ellas apoyan viajando 2 o 4 veces por semana al mercado local de la municipio a vender sus  cosechas,  por lo que ellas ven la necesidad y el mismo beneficio para su familia por lo que requieren de capital para invertir en sus negocios y por otra parte invertir parte en el cultivo de sus esposos.
texts.en:
Duo Santa Teresita is made up of Marta, 36 years old, and her mother-in-law, Justa, 62 years old. During the past 15 years, Justa has worked selling tortillas at her home. Marta's has a small business selling basic daily item from her home, where she also has a nixtamal [cooked maize] mill. From six in the morning, Marta attends to her customers, mostly women who come to grind their nixtamal and, at the same time, buy bread for their children travelling to school. 

She is requesting this loan for the purchase of daily consumption products because she needs a bigger supply in her store. Both women's husbands work in agriculture, planting flowers and vegetables; that's why the women support them by travelling 2 or 4 times a week to the local market of the municipality to sell their crops. They see the need to do this and the benefits for their families. This is why they need capital to invest in their businesses as well as investing some part in their husband's harvest.

loans.use: to buy products for daily consumption.

location.town: Aldea Cruz Blanca San Juan Sacatepequez

loans.name: Arafat Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité Arafat est créé depuis le 7 juillet 2011, il est composé de neuf femmes qui sont issues du même quartier, elles sont parentes et amies. Leur activité dominante est le petit commerce, mais certaines femmes font aussi du tissage de nattes et de l'embouche.

Madame Kharbiya la responsable est âgée de 31 ans, mariée elle est mère de quatre enfants et mène un petit commerce de sel et de tomate avec une bonne expérience de plus de 5 ans. Elle est à droite habillée en sari bleu clair et a levé la main gauche.


Elle achéte ses produits et revend au marché de sa localité.


Son prêt lui servira d'augmenter la quantité de marchandises pour espérer gagner plus de revenus.


Elle aide son mari dans la prise en charge de la famille et souhaite aussi constituer une bonne épargne.
texts.en:
The Arafat solidarity group was set up on 7 July 2011. It is made up of nine women who are friends and relatives all living in the same area. Their main activity is small-scale trade, but some of them also weave mats or fatten livestock.

Kharbiya is the group leader. She is 31 years old, married and the mother of four children. She runs a small business selling salt and tomatoes, and has more than five years experience. She is pictured holding up her hand on the right of the photo, in a pale blue sari. 

After buying her products, Kharbiya resells them at a local market. This loan will help her buy more products and increase her earnings. She helps her husband provide for the family and would also like to put some money into savings.

loans.use: to buy food products for reselling

loans.name: Sop Serigne Cheikh Tidiane Sy Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité Sop Serigne Cheikh Tidiane Sy du banc villageois de Keur Mayoro est créé le 27 décembre 2010. Le groupe est constitué de 07 femmes. Elles sont parentes et entretiennent d'excellentes relations. Elles font du petit commerce et de l'embouche.

La présidente Khoudia est une femme mariée de 62 ans avec 03 enfants. Elle fait de l'embouche bovine et de l'agriculture. Elle achete ses moutons au marché de de Keur Momar Sarr. Sur la photo elle est à droite avec une écharpe blanc prés de la fenêtre.

Avec son prêt elle va acheter des moutons pour continuer ses activités.

Avec ses bénéfices elle aide son mari et ses enfants à faire face aux besoins quotidiens de survie.
texts.en:
The solidarity group Sop Serigne Cheikh Tidiane Sy of the Keur Mayoro banc villageois was created on 27 December 2010. The group is made up of seven women who are all related and get on very well. Their business is small-scale trade and fattening livestock.

The head of the group, Khoudia, is 62 years old, married and the mother of 3 children. She works in agriculture and fattens livestock. She buys sheep at the Keur Momar Sarr market. She is pictured on the right by the window, wearing a white scarf. With her loan she will buy sheep to continue her work. The profits will be used to help provide her husband and children with basic necessities.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Sant  Yalla Group

texts.fr:
Le  groupe de solidarité Sant Yalla existe depuis le 7 juillet 2011. Il est composé de quatorze femmes qui sont issues du même quartier et dont les activités principales sont le tissage de nattes, l'embouche et le petit commerce.

Mbarka la responsable est âgée de 28 ans, elle est célibataire mère d'un enfant. Elle fait de l'embouche, a une bonne expérience de 10 ans et mène depuis un mois un petit commerce de beignets au poisson et viande dans le village.

Elle achète les moutons au marché central de la communauté rurale et c'est au même endroit qu'elle va les revendre quatre ou cinq mois après.

Son prêt lui servira à renforcer son activité d'embouche en augmentant son cheptel.

Elle souhaite avec les bénéfices attendus augmenter son épargne, subvenir à ses besoins et à ceux de son enfant.
texts.en:
The solidarity group Sant Yalla has been in existence since July 7, 2011. It comprises fourteen women who are from the same district and whose main work involves weaving mats, fattening livestock, and small-scale commerce. 

Mbarka, the group's official, is 28 years old, unmarried, and the mother of one child. And she raises livestock with tens years of good experience in it. Also, for a month now, she has had a small business selling fish or meat fritters in the village. 

Mbarka purchases sheep at the central market in the rural community. She is going to resell them at the same place four or five months later. 

Her loan will serve to bolster her livestock business by increasing her herd. With the profits expected, she wishes to increase her saving and to support herself, as well as her child.

loans.use: to buy sheep to fatten and then sell

loans.name: Sop Khadim Rassoul Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité SOP Khadim Rassoul est créé le 27 décembre 2010. Il regroupe 04 femmes. Elles sont des amies qui entretiennent de bonnes relations. Elles font du petit commerce.

La responsable du groupe Ndéye est une femme mariée et mère de 03 enfants. Elle est âgée de 45 ans avec. Elle fait du petit commerce. Elle s'approvisionne dans les marchés environnants. 

Elle mène cette activité de petit commerce de niébé et arachides depuis plus de 03 ans. Sur la photo elle est en boubou avec des motifs bleu et rose tout à fait à droite.

Avec son prêt elle voudrai acheter des marchandises pour son commerce.

Avec ses bénéfices elle aide son mari concernant la santé et la nourriture des enfants.
texts.en:
The solidarity group SOP Khadim Rassoul was set up on 27 December 2010. It has four members, all women, who are friends and get on well. They all work in small-scale businesses.

The head of the group, Ndéye, is 45 years old, married and the mother of three children. She works in small-scale retail and buys her products in local markets. She has been trading black-eyed peas and groundnuts for more than three years. She is pictured on the right wearing a blue and pink patterned boubou (wide dress). With her loan she would like to buy supplies for her business. With her earnings she helps with her husband's healthcare and buys food for her children.

loans.use: to buy goods (black-eyed peas and ground nuts) for their business

loans.name: Duo El Misperal De San Bartolo. Group

texts.es:
Duo el Misperal de San Bartolo. 
Este Duo esta integrado por dos Señoras las cuales son: Doña Marta Lilia de 47 años de edad,ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras por mayor,en la comunidad donde vive ella tiene 4 hijos a su cargo y estan estudiando en la escuela local y tiene a su hija mayor quien es la que le ayuda a vender su producto,junto a lado de su esposo ellos salen desde muy temprano de su casa para ayegar a el punto donde ellos venden para atender a sus clientes,ella a demas de dedicarse a la actividad antes mencionada tambien se dedica a la venta de delantales en sus tiempos libres,es por eso que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de frutas y verduras,al igual que la siguiente socia esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mercaderia para su venta.
texts.en:
Duo Misperal of San Bartolo.
